Version: 0.25.0.642 Steam

OS: OSX Yosemite 10.10

Screenshot: http://gyazo.com/a38530eb5ad9958d3c586deebb401615

I've downloaded the latest KSP from Steam onto my mac running Yosemite. I can't seem to click any menu items at all. I can click the diagnostic menu when it first opens, but not any of the buttons. Any ideas?
I have had this problem as well. Never found a fix.

I hate to be the bearer of bad news, but for whatever reason, KSP (or maybe it's just Unity, I'm not really sure) is really unreliable on Yosemite. I wish I knew why, but I really have no clue, I'm afraid... You might want to try running it in fullscreen/windowed modes where possible, just to see if there's something to do with how it's trying to parse input or something.
